CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: cannonball
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The charge detonates on impact, scattering lethal fragments in a small area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: grapeshot
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The charge detonates on firing, scattering lethal steel balls in a small area.
